# 漏洞银行“大咖面对面”分享汇总 1~14 期

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-14-qi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-14-qi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-14-qi
loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-14-qi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-yisi-qi
loudong-yinxing-da-ka-mianduimian-fenxiang-huizong-1-yisi-qi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
